chapters.title: Chapter 16:  The Subject of Negotiations
chapters.info:
Tervail Dura,
      p. 398 (477)â€”Dark-haired,
      bold-nosed Warder with a white, deep scar on his face.  He is bonded to
      Beonin.  He was on guard at
      Logain's door when Nynaeve
      Healed him.
      See also
      Marinye, Beonin.
